comment: /**  * @param ip, like "192.168.1.1"  * @return the complete DNS record for that IP.  */
code: /**  * @param ip, like "192.168.1.1"  * @return the complete DNS record for that IP.  */ @Converter public static Record toRecord(String ip) throws IOException {     Resolver res = new ExtendedResolver().     Name name = ReverseMap.fromAddress(ip).     int type = Type.PTR.     int dclass = DClass.IN.     Record rec = Record.newRecord(name, type, dclass).     Message query = Message.newQuery(rec).     Message response = res.send(query).     Record[] answers = response.getSectionArray(Section.ANSWER).     if (answers.length == 0) {         return null.     } else {         return answers[0].     } }
